@string/custom
What\'s on your mind? History About Tags Nothing finished yet…\nYour finished items will be here Got nothing ToDo? Got nothing important? Tap \"+\" to create a new note. No tags used yet, add one now? Something went wrong :-/ This is a light-weighted to-do list app that you can customize however you want, Enjoy! \nPlease support or rate if you want!\nBy Jack ;) Delete All Notes Note Deleted main_history_switch main_overdue_switch normal_overdue_switch History Records Search Search… No matching results Keep history records Remind me of overdue tasks ToDo will actively remind you of overdue reminders/tasks ToDo won\'t actively remind you of overdue reminders/tasks Remind me of all overdue tasks ToDo will remind you of all overdue reminders/tasks ToDo will only remind you of important overdue reminders/tasks notification_settings Notification Settings Set notification behaviors for reminders. notification_light Enable Reminder Blink Light Blink the device\'s LED when receives a reminder LED indicator turned off for reminder notifications twenty_four_hour_mode Use 24-hour format 13:00 1:00 PM Note Finished notes finished notes restored notes deleted Note Restored Undo All notes deleted! All notes finished! Restore all notes Finish All Notes ca-app-pub-7337506680436750/2602834629 Press again to exit Support! Rate! Select All "If you have any questions, suggestions or anything else you want, please contact me via my" " Email . Something completely wrong happened @_@ Delete Modify Restore Notes From ToDo Notes shared from ToDo: \n ToDo\n Share notes via… ToDo — An awesome to-do list app Hey! Check out ToDo on Google Play\nhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jackz314.todo\nToDo — An highly customizable to-do list app that can maximize your efficiency! Share this app with other people! Feedback & Report Send Cancel Finish Print/Export Share Restore Delete Thanks for your feedback! Please describe the problems you met, or just throw your suggestions at me ;)\nFor more detailed messages that you wish to stress, please head to About and send me an email! Feedback & Report Your message goes here… Change the list text size Text Size new text size Are you sure? This text size may not be suitable for you font_setting_key Font Settings Change font settings Search for a font Fonts here are provided by Google Fonts. Monospace Weight Regular(400) Italic Failed to load the font list from font provider, please try again later.\nOnly local added fonts will be shown. Failed to load preview of fonts, please try again later.\nThe list will be shown with the default font instead. Test out the font here… This is a preview of the font. Your clipboard is empty. recreate_main_key \ font_overriden_key Setting font to: googel_font_name_key Just do it! I\'ll reconsider We\'ll need the storage permission to backup your notes Please grant the storage permission in order to backup We\'ll need the storage permission to restore your notes Please grant the storage permission in order to restore You have to grant us the storage permission in order to proceed! Thanks for your corporation! ToDo Export Exporting… Export Succeed! Export Failed, try again later! ToDo Export Print failed, page count is zero. Are you sure? This color setting might have conflicted with other color settings Share Upgrade to ToDo+! About History Settings Tags More About Purchase failed:(\nPlease try again later or report an error! Purchase canceled, need to reconsider? Version: Welcome to ToDo! Here goes some simple tutorials Tap \"+\" to create a new note Long tap \"+\" to use voice input Tap to modify Swipe left to finish Long tap to select multiple items Check out the settings or history later to have your most customized experience! Now if you got everything, just go ahead and remove all of the gibberish tutorials\n\nEnjoy Taking notes! :) Preset Themes theme_selector_key theme_selector_summary_key theme_selector_value_key Indigo theme_selector_position_key restore_purchase_key Restore purchase Restore your previous purchase Purchase updated! Restore procedure failed! if you purchased something and the problem persists, please contact us via the about page or the feedback! Error log copied to clipboard! Can\'t launch purchase for now, please try again later Sending feedback… Please wait… Copied to Clipboard! dark_theme_key Dark theme Change to a darker theme main_fragment_tag important_fragment_tag clipboard_fragment_tag Say something… Google voice recognizing service not installed or no internet connection, please try again later! We\'ll need the record audio permission to enable voice recognition! There\'s a problem when trying to record audio, please try again later! Can\'t connect to the server for now, please try again later! Recognition failed, it could be because you don\'t have google services installed or can\'t connect to the voice recognizer service! Recognition failed, it could be because you don\'t have google services installed or can\'t connect to the voice recognizer service! Note added to ToDo! com.google.android.gm.action.AUTO_SEND Purchasing… Verifying… Thanks for your purchase!\nEnjoy your Ad free experience ;) Thanks for your support! :-) "Next Up: " • "Then: " "Every " Next year "Next " at Tomorrow "Overdue " Snooze Later Hour Day yesterday hour hours ago in Normal Important Urgent Manage notifications for all normal reminders Manage notifications for all important reminders Manage notifications for all super important reminders Hey! Why would you add a past time as a reminder? Are you a time traveler? Failed to create reminder Failed to create the reminder for this ToDo, please reset the reminder and try again later!
